articles.title: Welcome!
articles.contents:
Home
      About
      ☰
      
      
      
        
          
            
          
            Welcome!
          
          
            
          
          
            I am currently in the PhD Economics program at University of California Santa Barbara (UCSB). My research interests are in applied micro-economics fields. My general areas of interest are education and crime economics, with focuses on higher education and judicial sentencing practices.
